title: Gene identified that increases risk of antibiotic reaction

title_detail.value: Gene identified that increases risk of antibiotic reaction

summary: Researchers have identified a gene that increases the risk for a severe and potentially life-threatening reaction to the commonly prescribed antibiotic vancomycin.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have identified a gene that increases the risk for a severe and potentially life-threatening reaction to the commonly prescribed antibiotic vancomycin.
